singlePlayerMode

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • singlePlayerMode.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    GameBoard class is a class that holds the logic of the game. The whole class is dominated by one main method runGameBoard which contains all of the following explanations. Most of the Classes are instantiated in the GameBoard this class is designed for single player mode of the game FasTyper the game is started in this class in a time limit of 60 seconds (Stopwatch checks the time is over or not. The loop ends when a method of class Stopwatch, getElapsedTime returns number 60000 (AKA 60Secs). The main Gui frame of the game(MainFrame is instantiated. We added a KeyListener to the frame so that the MainFrame be sensitive to the Keyboard activities. The whole class is dominated by one main method runGameBoard which contains all of the following explanations.
